ability.meaning_en: the power or skill to do something
ability.example: She has the ability to learn fast.

action.meaning_en: the fact or process of doing something
action.example: We need to take action immediately.

always.meaning_en: at all times; on all occasions

beautiful.meaning_en: pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically

become.example: He wants to become a doctor.

believe.meaning_en: accept as true; feel sure of the truth
believe.example: I believe you can do it!

build.example: They plan to build a new house.

business.meaning_en: a person's regular occupation or trade
business.example: He runs a successful clothing business.

care.meaning_en: the provision of what is necessary for health or protection
care.example: You need to take care of yourself.

choose.meaning_en: pick out as being the best of two or more alternatives

decide.meaning_en: come to a resolution in the mind
decide.example: I must decide what to eat for lunch.

development.meaning_en: the process of growing or causing to grow
development.example: The overall development of the city is impressive.

dream.meaning_en: a series of thoughts or images during sleep
dream.example: I had a beautiful dream last night.

education.meaning_en: the process of receiving or giving systematic instruction
education.example: Education is the key to success.

effort.example: She made a great effort to finish the project.

everyone.example: Everyone is excited for the trip.

family.meaning_en: a group of parents and children living together
family.example: I love spending time with my family.

friend.meaning_en: a person with whom one has a bond of mutual affection

future.meaning_en: the time that is still to come

goal.meaning_en: the object of a person's ambition or effort
goal.example: My goal is to learn English fluently.

grow.meaning_en: undergo natural development by increasing in size

happy.meaning_en: feeling or showing pleasure or contentment

health.meaning_en: the state of being free from illness or injury

help.meaning_en: make it easier or possible for someone to do something
help.example: Can you help me with this box?

important.example: It is important to drink water.

knowledge.meaning_en: information and skills acquired through experience

learn.meaning_en: acquire knowledge of or skill in something
learn.example: I want to learn how to swim.

life.meaning_en: the existence of an individual human being

listen.meaning_en: give one's attention to a sound
listen.example: Please listen carefully to the instructions.

money.meaning_en: a current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes
money.example: I need some money to buy a coffee.

nature.meaning_en: the phenomena of the physical world
nature.example: He enjoys being out in nature.

opportunity.meaning_en: a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something
opportunity.example: This job is a great opportunity.

person.meaning_en: a human being regarded as an individual
person.example: He is a very kind person.

practice.meaning_en: perform an activity regularly to improve one's skill
practice.example: You need to practice every day.

quality.meaning_en: the standard of something as measured against other things
quality.example: This TV has excellent picture quality.

question.meaning_en: a sentence worded or expressed so as to elicit information

respect.meaning_en: a feeling of deep admiration for someone

success.meaning_en: the accomplishment of an aim or purpose
success.example: Her hard work led to her success.

time.meaning_en: the indefinite continued progress of existence

understand.meaning_en: perceive the intended meaning of words

value.meaning_en: the regard that something is held to deserve

work.meaning_en: activity involving mental or physical effort done in order to achieve a purpose
work.example: I need to work on my assignment.
